version_description:
- Take photos with the dB reading shown
- Ability to share, print, and store dB photos
- Record dB readings on beautiful strip charts (optional)
- Option to turn off ads (optional)
- iOS 7 compatibility
- 4-inch retina screen support

IMPORTANT: in case of problems please contact the support address provided under "Developer Website". It is not possible to reply on App Store comments.

This update addresses an issue with the App Store that prevented the app from launching for some users after a purchase.
This update addresses an issue with the App Store that prevented the app from launching for some users after a purchase.

This version fixes several issues with requesting permission to access the microphone, back camera, and storing images to the photos library. Also, the in-app store is updated to properly display the preview video again.

Strip charts are now even easier to delete by swiping them left or right and two new buttons make switching between gauge display and strip chart recorder more clear. You may still just swipe between those two views.

And maybe you notice, the camera now opens very smoothly and quick.

Thank you for using Decibels. I'm always happy about positive reviews and comments.
Feel free to contact me at iphone@bannach.ch in case something is unclear.

It also includes all the improvements introduced in version 2.1.3:

This version fixes a bug that prevented some paper strips with annotations to be deleted permanently. It also improves the experience when adding annotations.
